PropertyList.name: Before engines start
PropertyList.description: After you have done the Preflight inspection, you're ready to go through the Pre-startup checklist. In this tutorial you will learn how to prepare the aircraft for the engines startup.

step.message: Now let's prepare the aircraft for engines startup. I'll read out the checklist, you execute and confirm the items.
First make sure, that the boarding is completed, all passengers have taken their seats and all doors are closed
The parking brake has to be set

error.message: Set the parking brake

step.message: Both fuel switches have to be set to NORMAL

error.message: Set the left fuel switch to the NORMAL position
Set the right fuel switch to the NORMAL position

step.message: The fuel tank selector has to be in the norm position

error.message: Set the tank selector to the NORM position.

step.message: Both boost pumps must be off

error.message: Switch off the AFT boost pump
Switch off the FWD boost pump

step.message: All circuit breakers on the main C/B panel have to be in

error.message: Insert ALL circuit breakers!

step.message: All circuit breakers on the center console C/B panel have to be in

error.message: Insert ALL circuit breakers!

step.message: All circuit breakers on the overhead C/B panel have to be in

error.message: Insert ALL circuit breakers!

step.message: Both generator switches must be off

error.message: Set the left generator switch to off
Set the right generator switch to off

step.message: The flaps must be fully retracted

error.message: Retract the flaps

step.message: The fuel condition levers must be off

error.message: Pull the left condition lever to OFF (use LMB)
Pull the right condition lever to OFF (use LMB)

step.message: Props must be feather

error.message: Pull the left prop lever to feather
Pull the right prop lever to feather

step.message: Throttles must be in idle position

error.message: Pull the left throttle to idle
Pull the right throttle to idle

step.message: All lights have to be off

error.message: Turn off the Beacon
Turn off the cabin lights
Turn off the overhead light
Turn off the instrument lights
Turn off the left landing light
Turn off the right landing light
Turn off POSN LT
Turn off ANTI-COLL light
Turn off Taxi light
Turn off CAUTION LT

step.message: Enable external power (via Menu --> DHC-6 --> Toggle external power). Hit "F10" if the Menubar is not visible

error.message: Enable the external power via the Menu

step.message: Select the power source to external power

error.message: Click RMB on the External/Battery switch to select the external power as power source

step.message: Switch master battery switch on

error.message: Click LMB on the Master battery switch to get power from the battery

step.message: Now switch on the cabin lights

error.message: Switch on the cabin lights

step.message: Also switch on the overhead light

error.message: Switch on the overhead light

step.message: Switch the instrument lights to bright

error.message: Don't fall asleep ;) You can now switch on the instrument lights

step.message: Switch the IND selector to BAT

error.message: Click LMB on the IND SELECT switch to get voltage from the battery for the engine starter

step.message: Check the DC Volts: It has to be minimum 18V; normally it's around 24-25V

error.message: The battery is too empty. You can't fly with an empty battery. Restart FlightGear and try again.

step.message: Turn on CAUTION LT

error.message: To test function of the warning lights, you have to turn on the CAUTION LT switch

step.message: Check that all lights on the warning panel illuminate
Turn off CAUTION LT

error.message: After testing the function of the warning lights, you can turn off the CAUTION lights again

step.message: Test fire detection: The fire pull handles must light up and you hear a alarm bell sound

error.message: To check the functionality of the fire detection, you must activate the test switch!

step.message: Test the mute function of the fire bell.

error.message: In case of an engine fire you can mute this annoying fire bell. Therefore you have to test the funcionality!

step.message: Dismute the firebell again so that you can hear the alarm in case of an engine fire.

error.message: Dismute the fire bell again!

step.message: Deactivate the fire detetion test.

error.message: Now you can switch off the fire detection test again!

step.message: Check the fuel quantity. It has to be enough for the flight you've planned
Now we have to test the functionality of the fuel indicators and the fuel warning lights. Press and hold down the IND TEST button.

error.message: Press and hold down the IND TEST button!

step.message: Check that the fuel gauges for the forward and the rear tank indicate 0.

error.message: Press and hold down the IND TEST button to test the fuel indicators!

step.message: Check that both warning lights "FWD FUEL LOW LEVEL" and "AFT FUEL LOW LEVEL" light up.

error.message: Press and hold down the IND TEST button to test the fuel warning lights!

step.message: Now you can release the IND TEST button again.

error.message: Release the IND TEST button!

step.message: Check that the hydraulic pressure is between 1300 and 1600 PSI.
Great. Now our Twin Otter is ready to start their engines.
